taskDescription: The glycolysis pathway shown in Figure 29.8 has a number of intermediates that contain phosphate groups. Why can 3-phosphoglyceryl phosphate and phosphoenolpyruvate transfer a phosphate group to ADP while glucose 6-phosphate cannot?
